ChatMessage - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.communication.responses
Msg that identifies a new message sent/received The Chat message doesn't contain receiver because it's used buy the communication layer, there is no interest in saying: "This is message is for you, I send it only to you, you are the receiver"

ClientCommunication - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.client.communication
this class should be implemented from the client class that sends messages to the server, being it through RMI or TCP or other, this class can be used from the client (being it a controller, an observer or directly the view) to send messages to the server

commonCardsPointsManager - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.GoalManager
 
CommonCardsPointsManager - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers
A PointsManager that handles all the common cards, which are goals that anyone can fulfill only once, this PointsManager does not take into account neither the points nor the edited bookshelf state returned from the pattern
CommonCardsPointsManager(List<Player>, Deck) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.CommonCardsPointsManager
Generates a CommonCardsPointsManager which draws 2 cards from the given deck and assigns tokens to the cards based on the number of players, it also creates an appropriate listener because some internal changes (tokens on cards) need to be communicated to the view.
CommonCardsPointsManager(List<Player>, Deck, Integer) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.CommonCardsPointsManager
Generates a CommonCardsPointsManager which draws 'drawNumber' cards from the given deck and assigns tokens to the cards based on the number of players, it also creates an appropriate listener because some internal changes (tokens on cards) need to be communicated to the view.
CommonCardsPointsManager(List<Player>, Deck, Integer, Function<Integer, Stack<Integer>>) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.CommonCardsPointsManager
Generates a CommonCardsPointsManager which draws 'drawNumber' cards from the given deck and assigns tokens to the cards based on the number of players, using the 'generateCardTokens' function, it also creates an appropriate listener because some internal changes (tokens on cards) need to be communicated to the view.
CommonCardsPointsManager(List<Player>, Map<Player, Integer>, UpdateRule, Deck, Map<Pattern, Stack<Integer>>, Map<Player, List<Integer>>, Map<Player, Set<Pattern>>) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.CommonCardsPointsManager
Used for deserialization
